comments.message:
Chat Conversation Start
9:37AM
I have dropped a feedback via your website on 15/04/2016 (more than 5 days ago) and via McDonalds message (more than an hour ago), but has yet to receive a response. Apparently those portals are not effective feedback tools.
Anyway, the feedback is about making a takeaway purchase (INV No. 001650200042662, dated 15/04/2015) but getting the wrong item. I paid for 9pcs nuggets meal but got a 4 pcs mcwings meal instead. Im not sure if the branch manager is hard up on getting profit, but as a customer, I am definitely not happy paying for something that i did not get, or getting something of lesser value of what i have paid for. I don't think McDonalds are out to cheat my money, so do let me know how can i claim back what i deserve.

I believe this system maintenance is over.  On this day 24 april 2016, at 1130am i placed an online order & delivery time to be at 1245pm. Sadly now at 125pm my BREAKFAST is not here yet. I called the hotline & press no. 2 to track my order, waited for 6mins still no one answered. But surprisingly when i called ur hotline & press no. 1, less than 1 min my call was answered. Is this the service you guys practice for after order customers? & as whats promised by the call centre guy the manager will call me ASAP on my delivery status but 5mins later still no response. Haha impressive!!
Server down again?? Been trying to order till now no response ... got an outlet just opposite my block . But seems useless of the operating hour ! So dissappointed

comments.message: Let's post pictures of our burgers. This is the beef mushroom "deluxe" from Suntec.😂😂😂 I want to see whose is worse.
Wow so fresh! 😒
Guys... Fire the idiot in marketing who thought it'd be a good idea to advertise the size of your carbon footprint.

My family and I love your new burgers and ever since they were introduced, we have patronised several of your outlets many times.
However, I have to highlight to you my very bad experience at your outlet at Siglap Centre just now.  It's not the first time we've had a bad experience there, hence, my sending you this post.
The staff there are very rude and I believe my burger was prepared way before my order was even taken.  The lettuce was completed "dead and withered" as though it had been placed in the microwave.  The beef pattie was hard and dry.  Even though my order was for "A Classic Beef with Bacon", there was no bacon whatsoever.
To make matters worse, I was asked "what sauce I would like to have". When I replied that I would like BBQ sauce I was given only 1.  When I explained that I had two burgers and would like to have 2 sauces, I was very rudely told I could only have 1 because I didn't order the burgers as "a meal".  Come on, how much does 1 BBQ sauce cost, considering the amount of money you spend on advertisements.
I've had vey pleasant experiences at your Stadium outlet, Bedok Mall outlet and several others which means that obviously, your staff must be going through some kind of training - so what about the staff at Siglap Centre.
I told your staff that I would be writing to you but she obviously thought I was joking. Sorry but I'm not going to let her off this time😬
So there were supposed to be mushrooms in our burger hmmm Melissa Wong
Macdonald's can we change the beef burgers to a chicken burger is that I don't take beef I hope you can let those me and other people who don't take beef

comments.message: It's a happy meal. Breakfast style

Morning breakfast  for $3 why not include Saturday,  Sunday  n Public  Holidays  where those senior citizens are sitting  n relaxing after  their tai zi exercise  ( I saw so many times of the  seniors sitting  at Mc Donald w/o ordering meal ) Mc Donald  meal is very expensive, senior citizens  cannot  afford but they like  to eat - hope this message would answered 👌😉
Which of sets (A to E) are the $3 meals ?

Hi, I like to extend a Big Thank You to Mc Donald Changi City Point for helping me in preparing 130 Sausage Mcmuffin on Sunday morning 10th Apr 2016. I've tried calling several McDonald branches in the east if they could prepare for me the 130 Sausage Mcmuffin and I will collect it at 8am Sunday morning but only Changi City Point branch was willing to assist me. The transaction was smooth and easy, the branch manager was friendly and the staffs were helpful. One of the staff helped me to carry half of the 130 Mcmuffins to my car. These Mcmuffins are for student's breakfast at the nearby mosque. I was informed that the students were very happy to have the Mcdonalds BF. That makes me and my family more than happy. Thank you once again to McDonald Changi City Point for your good job. Keep it up.

comments.message: Wth is wrong with some people here? I saw some comments regarding why aren't there pork bacon & can muslim eat this burger? FYI,Mcds in Singapore are all certified halal by MUIS. The Classic Beef with Chicken Bacon was surprisingly good, well done McD's! But the Beef and Mushroom Deluxe was horrible -- why can't you guys use the same lettuce (whole-leaf please, not random, hard chunks)? It was a vile experience, a crudely organised sandwich. Which is hard to fathom because the Classic Beef was presented so nicely.

Sweeten your Extra Value MealTM with a free Vanilla Cone when you pay with UOB Mighty!

Valid till 13 April 2016, after breakfast hours till 11pm at all McDonald’s Singapore main restaurants, while stocks last. Not valid via McDelivery, Drive-Thrus, Self-Ordering Kioks, Dessert kiosk and McCafe.
